## 测试KEGG富集函数
```{r}
rm(list = ls())
source("fun.R")
b <- subset_herb(herb = c("黄芪"), type = "Herb_cn_name")
sub_data <- subset(b, b$molecule == "hexadecanoic acid")
gene_sub <- sub_data[1:10, ]$target

kk <- enrich_target_KEGG(x = sub_data, gene_list = gene_sub)
clusterProfiler::dotplot(kk)
barplot(kk,title = "KEGG")
dotplot(kk, title = "KEGG")
```

## 测试GO富集函数
```{r}
source("fun.R")
a <- subset_herb(herb = "蝉蜕", type = "Herb_cn_name")

BP <- enrich_target_GO(x = a, gene_list = a$target)
barplot(BP,title = "BP")
dotplot(BP, title = "BP")
